```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, error = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)

library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(plotly)
```

```{r, total area}

area_by_district <- read_csv("area_by_district_1908.csv")


area_by_district <- area_by_district %>%
  filter(district != "All")

ggplotly(tooltip = "text", 
         ggplot(area_by_district, aes(x = district, y = total_area_desyatin, fill = district, text = total_area_desyatin)) +
  geom_col() +
  coord_flip() +
    theme(legend.position="none") +
  labs(y = "Total area (in desyatins)", 
       x = NULL, 
       title = "Total land area by district for Kostroma Guberniia")) %>% 
  config(displayModeBar = FALSE)
  
```
